and content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

and content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or nickname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or nickname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_refboard (bno, title, content, nickname) values (seq_refboard.nextval, #{title},#{content},#{nickname})

update tbl_refboard set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_refboard set replycnt = (select count(rno) from tbl_refreply where bno = #{bno}) where bno = #{bno}
